title: Post Parking Charge to Folio
description: A hotel guest has used the valet parking service and the charge needs to be added to their room bill.

tasks.description: Identify the guest's account using their vehicle's license plate or valet ticket number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the guest's room and folio.

tasks.description: Retrieve the standard daily rate for valet parking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct parking fee.

tasks.description: Post the parking charge to the guest's folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the charge to the guest's bill.
